item.title: New beginnings
item.description: Welcome to my new site, where I hope I post things. // A bad man guard let _ = content else { print("I am a failure.") return // To life } // A good man print("Here you are: \(content).")

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Polymapper üìç A simple web-based tool to generate coordinate arrays from polylines. You can either paste coords or choose an area on the map. SixthBoro ‚ìÇÔ∏è The iOS application that better helps display PATH train times in a fast and feature-packed way. Built with my friend Avi. Bolt Learning ‚ö° Worked on an iOS client along with Jack and Phil. Bolt leverages innovative adaptive learning algorithms to provide students with a smarter way to prepare for the SAT¬Æ.
